trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chalfont
There was one other sighting in Chalfont on or around August 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog outside when I noticed a flash in the sky. We were moving up the street. I knew right away it wasn't anything man-made, such as a plane, helicoptor, blimp, etc. It gave off a silver flash of light before it flew into the clouds a second later. It looked like a miniature silver sun.
Summary: Extremely & Entirely quiet. Gave off silver flash and flew. Moved quick.
